body:
More staff spotlights, please welcome SirCyanide to the stage!

Introduce yourself in 4-5 sentences.*​
My name is Henry, I've been apart of Avicus since 2013. Outside this server, I'm a varsity swimmer on my high school team. Music is my favorite subject (even though some people debate and insist that music is not a subject), I'm in three Double A (Honors) Choirs, and I intend on majoring in the medical field. My second favorite subject is Science, hence why I want to practice medicine. Fun fact about me is that I have three kidneys, yeah...

​*What are you most excited/obsessed over at the moment?*​
School trip to New York, and Boston.

​*What interests you the most in life?*​
Science, astronomy.

​*What music/art/media do you like?*​
I'm picky with my music, and I don't have a specific genre, but with movies, I'm fond of action/thriller/horror/suspense/comedy-like movies.

​*Where are you from?*​
Ohio

​*What are the most common questions you get asked while moderating?*​
"Can you ban this dude?", and "Why did you ban my friend?"

​*Anything else you want to mention?*​
*Sips tea*

title: Staff Spotlight #3 - SirCyanide

replies.body:
That format appears weird for some reason nise to see these types of posts again though.

 Anything else you want to mention?*​
 "Mr. Dick Penis."
